extendedInfo.description: NoteOur server will maintain only 24hours data.WiFi is compulsory.for above 2.3.0 version please enable 'Use Wireless Networks' and 'Use GPS Satellites'.(Settings->Location and Security->'Use Wireless Networks' and 'Use GPS Satellites')Installation procedure as follows:Step 1.In Order to work with this app install "GPS Tracker & Tracer" in to your device. After downloading..open the application and click on register button. You have to register information about the device owner  (example sales and marketing person, employees,drivers, wife, children any of your dearer To record target user information) etc., After completion of successful registration you will get mail from server for activation of your account. Next you need to SignIn using your credentials. This is one time login process, no need to Signin Everytime. Once you Signin your data will be store in the server.  If you want to  see the tracked data go for step2.Step 2. click on Tracer Button, you will have to enter tracker name / mobile number and click on search button. you will see his/her location movments. if you click on location information you will see google GUI Map. (you can monitor information from your desktop also, we will provide you  the link once registration successfully done.)This works on Android versions 2.1 + and above.FAQDo I need Internet ?Yes internet or Wi-Fi connectivity is compulsory.Can i get old archives.No we keep only one day 24 hours.If I want to trace more than 24 hours data what i need to do ?Please write your requirements to support@digiknots.com so that we will analyze and give your correct solutions. It may cost you more to maintain server or you can have your own server to maintain multiple accounts.Do I need to pay extra for multiple accounts.?Yes the cost we mentioned is for single user only. For multiple account you need to register multiple times or mail us to support@digiknots.com.If I have multiple accounts do I need to download multiple times.No. You can contact us on support@digiknots.com for details we will help you.Do you maintain privacy ?Yes we do.Do you update this app regularly ?Yes we do update regularly with new features.Do we have to pay for updated versions ?No need this is only one time.Do I need to renew every year ?No amount is one time charges.do i need to purchase same app for new device?Yes, licence is segregated device wise.For More Details & Queries contact  : support@digiknots.com
